about_the_game:
Produce your soldiers, upgrade your equipment, and fight to win in a chaotic castle!

Build your team for 1-4 Online Co-op and PVE mode options!

Determine your strategy and be the first to destroy the opposing tower. As the commander, create a strategy for your team, determine soldier production, and provide support on the battlefield! As the blacksmith, create weapons , as the armor master, create armor, and as the engineer, develop the castle, and manage your economy.

ONLINE/LOCAL MULTIPLAYER MADNESS

To win in online multiplayer mode, you will need to work together.

Sabotage your friends

Infuriate your friend by slapping them during the production phase when tensions are high!!!

Basic Gameplay

  • Quick production within the tower is very important; move with WASD and interact with items using O and P.

  • Pay attention to upgrades, and be stronger than your opponent; you must keep a balance between your resource development and production objects.

  • You can create a different strategy in each game; runes determine your game strategy, move as a team and steer your game strategy with your runes.

  • As the Commander, you determine the production. Analyze the enemies coming from the opposing tower and determine your production order well!

  • Are the opponents too close? Attack them with the defense weapons on the tower!

  • Does your army need support? Go to the battlefield and give them power!

  • As an Engineer, you determine upgrades. Speeding up production and improving the raw materials will help you produce soldiers faster and make them stronger!

  • Don't forget to support the production within the tower. Train horses for the cavalry, produce shields for the infantry!

    • Siege weapons are under your control. Don't forget to research the trebuchet to capture the enemy tower!

    • In the Blacksmith role, you will produce weapons for your soldiers. Swords for infantry, crossbows for archers!

    • Melt the raw materials, pour it into a sword mold, cool it down and sharpen it with an anvil. The weapons are ready for battle!

    • In order to get your soldiers out of the tower faster, you should coordinate with the armor master and quickly complete the production.

    • In the role of armorer, you will produce armor for your soldiers. All soldiers want armor!!!

    • Melt the raw materials, pour it into an armor mold, cool it down and strengthen it with an anvil. Your soldiers are ready to go!

    • In order to get your soldiers out of the tower faster, you should coordinate with the blacksmith and complete the production quickly.

    Send your wrongly produced or dressed soldier into the void!
detailed_description:
From Keep Games


About the Game

Produce your soldiers, upgrade your equipment, and fight to win in a chaotic castle!

Build your team for 1-4 Online Co-op and PVE mode options!

Determine your strategy and be the first to destroy the opposing tower. As the commander, create a strategy for your team, determine soldier production, and provide support on the battlefield! As the blacksmith, create weapons , as the armor master, create armor, and as the engineer, develop the castle, and manage your economy.

ONLINE/LOCAL MULTIPLAYER MADNESS

To win in online multiplayer mode, you will need to work together.

Sabotage your friends

Infuriate your friend by slapping them during the production phase when tensions are high!!!

Basic Gameplay

  • Quick production within the tower is very important; move with WASD and interact with items using O and P.

  • Pay attention to upgrades, and be stronger than your opponent; you must keep a balance between your resource development and production objects.

  • You can create a different strategy in each game; runes determine your game strategy, move as a team and steer your game strategy with your runes.

  • As the Commander, you determine the production. Analyze the enemies coming from the opposing tower and determine your production order well!

  • Are the opponents too close? Attack them with the defense weapons on the tower!

  • Does your army need support? Go to the battlefield and give them power!

  • As an Engineer, you determine upgrades. Speeding up production and improving the raw materials will help you produce soldiers faster and make them stronger!

  • Don't forget to support the production within the tower. Train horses for the cavalry, produce shields for the infantry!

    • Siege weapons are under your control. Don't forget to research the trebuchet to capture the enemy tower!

    • In the Blacksmith role, you will produce weapons for your soldiers. Swords for infantry, crossbows for archers!

    • Melt the raw materials, pour it into a sword mold, cool it down and sharpen it with an anvil. The weapons are ready for battle!

    • In order to get your soldiers out of the tower faster, you should coordinate with the armor master and quickly complete the production.

    • In the role of armorer, you will produce armor for your soldiers. All soldiers want armor!!!

    • Melt the raw materials, pour it into an armor mold, cool it down and strengthen it with an anvil. Your soldiers are ready to go!

    • In order to get your soldiers out of the tower faster, you should coordinate with the blacksmith and complete the production quickly.

    Send your wrongly produced or dressed soldier into the void!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra - 10.12.6
  • Processor: 2 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB dedicated VRAM or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS High Sierra - 10.13.1
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB dedicated VRAM or better

name: Feudal Friends

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7-64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT / AMD HD 6850 / Intel HD Graphics 4400 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win7 -64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-650 / AMD A10-5800K
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 7510

short_description: Produce your soldiers, Improve your equipment, Battle and Win in a chaotic castle! Build your team for 1-4 Online Co-op and PVE mode options! Determine your strategy with over 40 Rune options and be the first to destroy the opposing tower.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian
